FuncDef:
The isolate remote enable command configures unidirectional isolation from the access side to the tunnel side in a BD.
The undo isolate remote enable command disables unidirectional isolation from the access side to the tunnel side in a BD. The isolate remote enable command configures unidirectional isolation from the access side to the tunnel side in a BD. The undo isolate remote enable command disables unidirectional isolation from the access side to the tunnel side in a BD. By default, unidirectional isolation from the access side to the tunnel side is disabled in a BD. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
